Description: Ostracon, large section (two fragments) of the upper-body and rim of a light-brown pottery storage-jar with everted and rounded rim, the fabric is red-grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394030) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394030)
